mapper.select: SELECT js.id id, js.goods_id goodsId, jg.NAME goodsName, js.cust_id custId, jc.name custName, js.price price, js.price_unit_id priceUnitId, au1.NAME priceUnitName, js.size size, js.size_unit_id sizeUnitId, au2.NAME sizeUnitName FROM jxc_sales js LEFT JOIN admin_unit au1 ON js.price_unit_id = au1.id LEFT JOIN admin_unit au2 ON js.size_unit_id = au2.id LEFT JOIN jxc_goods jg ON js.goods_id = jg.id LEFT JOIN jxc_cust jc ON js.cust_id = jc.id
